A4.text: Allegiant Stadium is an indoor multi-purpose stadium in Paradise, Nevada, U.S.

A5.text: Allegiant Stadium is located on about 62 acres (0.25 km2) of land west of Mandalay Bay at Russell Road and Hacienda Avenue, between Polaris Avenue and Dean Martin Drive, just west of Interstate 15.
